summary: [Spoilers] (Season 5) Syrio Forel is 100 Percent Alive and Here is Why
title: [Spoilers] (Season 5) Syrio Forel is 100 Percent Alive and Here is Why
body:
We have the rule in game of thrones that if there is no death scene/dead body there is a high chance that the person lived. Syrio was given an open ended last moment where it wasn’t confirmed that he died. In fact, Meryn Trant never says he killed Syrio. BUT HERE IS THE CLINCHER. In season 5 episode 10, Arya finally exacts her revenge on Meryn Trant and she shoves a cloth in his mouth to prevent him from talking. Then she goes on and delivers a monologue where she states he was the first one on her list because he killed Syrio. THE REASON HE IS GAGGED IS BECAUSE IT IS STILL MEANT TO BE LEFT OPEN ENDED. Meryn had no chance to refute the fact that he didn’t kill Syrio since he was gagged! The show runners intentionally did this because they plan on bringing Syrio back! THE FIRST SWORD IS COMING BACK!!



Source: https://ift.tt/2zIy8cg

summary: A 21-Year-Old Cosplayer Can Turn Herself Into Anyone, And Here Are 10+ Of Her Best Transformations
title: A 21-Year-Old Cosplayer Can Turn Herself Into Anyone, And Here Are 10+ Of Her Best Transformations
body:
Over the years Disney has been bringing back our favorite our favorite classics with their resurgence of live-action remakes, but they aren’t the only ones – meet Ksenia Perova, the 21-year-old cosplayer from Russia. Perova has been doing cosplay since 2014, and with her unique features combined with her artistry she has built up a giant following, 40.3k on Instagram to be exact.

“My first con was Ava Expo 2014 I made Oswin Oswald,” she writes on her account, “It was very strange and cute for me when people asked to make a selfie,” but just take one look at her photos and you will understand why she has become such a sensation. From Kim Possible to the Corpse Bride, the young artist brings each character to life with stunning realism.

While the young woman seems to have a natural talent she wrote that she doesn’t remember what exactly inspired her to begin cosplay, “I think that other cosplayers inspired me. I’ve been scrolling cool pics on websites and wanted to make something as cool as I saw.”

Each of Perova’s looks is brilliant, but she writes that her favorite cosplay thus far has been Arya from Game of Thrones, “It was interesting to make her, and she is one of my favorite characters from Game of Thrones. Mavis has a simple costume but I really like to play her.”

As for the future, the cosplayer is looking forward to creating a costume for her favorite childhood character, Mulan, “I need to buy new materials cause I want this cosplay to be perfect.”

Scroll down to check out Perova’s awesome cosplay looks!

More Info: Instagram | Facebook | Ko-fi

From Kim Possible to the Corpse Bride, the young artist brings each character to life with stunning realism.

While the young woman seems to have a natural talent she wrote that she doesn’t remember what exactly inspired her to begin cosplay, “I think that other cosplayers inspired me. I’ve been scrolling cool pics on websites and wanted to make something as cool as I saw.”

Each of Perova’s looks is brilliant, but she writes that her favorite cosplay thus far has been Arya from Game of Thrones, “It was interesting to make her, and she is one of my favorite characters from Game of Thrones. Mavis has a simple costume but I really like to play her.”

As for the future, the cosplayer is looking forward to creating a costume for her favorite childhood character, Mulan, “I need to buy new materials cause I want this cosplay to be perfect.”

Scroll down to check out Perova’s awesome cosplay looks!

summary: 'Game Of Thrones' Dethroned As Most Popular Show On Reddit By...
title: 'Game Of Thrones' Dethroned As Most Popular Show On Reddit By...
body:
‘Game Of Thrones’ Dethroned As Most Popular Show On Reddit By…

It’s an honor that Game of Thrones has held since 2011, but the HBO fantasy series has finally lost its grip on the number one spot over at Reddit. In honor of the new king, or should I say queen, sashay away Jon Snow!

The social news-sharing platform reveals RuPaul’s Drag Race now reigns supreme. How did this happen? Well, for starters Game of Thronesdidn’t air this year, while Drag Race aired…

View On WordPress

summary: Would anyone even be interested in my OC’s?
body:
Would anyone even be interested in my OC’s?

I put so much work and thought into them and yet I never write for them or bring them to the light. Anything I do for them (playlists on Spotify mostly) I keep to myself.


I have several for AHS, one for DW, one for The Hobbit and LOTR, one for Harry Potter, one for SU, one for MHA, one for Skins (UK), one for Hunger Games, one for The Mortal Instruments, one for Marvel, one for Detroit: Become Human, one for Game of Thrones, one for Supernatural, one for X-Men, and probably a couple more.


I’d love to talk about them to people but idk who’d be interested. I guess just like this post or reblog it if you are interested. Or if you just want to message me that works too lol. If even one person is interested I’ll post shit for em and write fics

summary: Jon Snow fan here
title: Jon Snow fan here
body:
I wanted to ask if I was not the only Jon fan who was fed up with the fact that Jon was treated by many fans with condescension and the fact that he was treated like an idiot.
No seriously I can not open the Tag Jon Snow without seeing at least 10 posts that talk or show Jon as an idiot and as Sansa will be disappointed by him, Jon has bent his knee to Daenarys  but in return you know what has earned 100,000 soldiers and 2 dragons. Maybe some people can not understand it but the North is indefensible, they have less than 10,000-12,000 fighters (if we also count the contingent from the Valley) and no natural defense to bottle the enemy.

And do not let me start talking about the lords of the North who apparently were not ready to fight for the Starks when the Bolton and allies had 6000 men, but would be ready to rebel against Jon who has the support of 2 fliyng  WMD .

I really want to ask how you would have managed to get a better deal  the north remains as it has been for the last 300 years, that is, a vassal kingdom which, however, is practically independent and in return receives enormous support against literally the end of the world as an army of ice zombie
